About My Work

These are my priorities when creating webapps.

Easy To Navigate

I enjoy making intuitive, easy to use websites with fast loading times.

Organized Code

As the subtitle suggests I value having an organized code and clean environment by implementing good practices learned over time.

Responsive Design

I always strive for my layouts to work on any device, no matter how big or small.

About Me

My name is Alex and I am a Front-End Developer currently residing in Pitesti, Romania. I have experience working with React, Redux, HTML, JavaScript and CSS with preprocessors like Sass.

I am passionate about building interactive user interfaces for client-facing and internal projects with a focus on UX.
